settings.title: Return Policy
settings.raw_content:
Full-priced items: we will accept items purchased on annabeck.com for a full refund, exchange or store credit within 5 days of receiving shipment, less shipping costs.

Sale section items: final sale, no price adjustments.

Personalized jewelry: final sale.

READ MORE.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.raw_content:
Free ground shipping on all orders.

International orders: You may be subject to import duties and taxes once a shipment reaches your country. Additional customs clearance charges must be paid by you; Anna Beck has no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. READ MORE.
